channel.title: ai on Linuxera
channel.description: Recent content in ai on Linuxera

item.title: A Beginner’s Guide to RAG: What I Wish Someone Told Me
item.description: A Beginner’s Guide to RAG: What I Wish Someone Told Me In this post, I’ll try to provide a beginners guide to RAG, focusing on what I wish someone told me before trying to build a RAG solution. Attention While I’ve made a strong effort to ensure the information is accurate, I’m far from an expert on the topic, and some details may not be entirely correct. If you notice anything missing or inaccurate, please leave a comment!

item.title: Introduction to LLM concepts
item.description: Introduction to LLM concepts In this post, I’ll cover various LLM concepts and the questions I asked myself while diving deep into the world of LLMs. I expect this post to be updated as I continue to learn more things around LLMs. Attention This post is the result of my exploratory work on LLMs. While I’ve made a strong effort to ensure the information is accurate, I’m far from an expert on the topic, and some details may not be entirely correct.
